name: Shark Game
description:
• Swim through the sea and munch on any fish that runs away from you
  • Dodge larger fish that swim towards you
  • Defeat the missile-launching Submarine and the massive Boss Crab!

HOW TO PLAY

  • Use the Arrow Keys to Move
  • Collide with smaller fish to eat them
  • Press Space to Jump on land

This game was created at the AfterFour summer camp program by one of the young campers with a little help from BluishGreenPro. Please be polite and encourage his game-making efforts in the comments!
